basics.name: Sara Joseph
basics.label: Frontend Developer with more than 7 years of experience
basics.summary: Web Developer with over 7 years of experience. Used to working in a team, generating code for the web maintenance and web updating of clients from different sectors. I am currently looking to work steadily in a company where I can grow and have a long career as a frontend developer.

work.name: Balidea
work.summary:
• Working remotely on web development with Drupal for the Danish energy agency Sparenergi.
  • Programming and layout of calculators that show the advantages and disadvantages, investments and savings that will be obtained with the different types of home renovations according to the data entered by the user.

work.name: Crealogix
work.summary:
• Working on web development for the e-retail sector. Mainly in the maintenance and development of new features for Danone Spain and Portugal.
  • Development of monthly promotions.
  • Annual redesign to improve web navigation and appearance.
  • Support to the marketing team for email campaigns.

work.name: Usacd
work.summary: • Development of email campaigns and slide presentations with Javascript for the health sector through Veeva CRM.

work.name: MSC Bikes
work.summary:
• Development of the company's website, intranet and B2B.
  • Creation of web designs with Photoshop and inDesign.
  • Creation of the outlet website with Wordpress and with Prestashop for the online store.

projects.name: Cotravelers
projects.description: Project created as a final project idea for the React.JS specialization course I took at IT Academy Barcelona Activa. It is an application to find cotravelers, joining trips created by other travelers or creating trips for other travelers to join.
projects.stack: Vite, ReactJS, Typescript, ChakraUI, Tailwind, Zustand, ESLint, Firebase
